title: Data-Driven Optimization Learning for Multi-Agent Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics skills, computer literacy, and comprehension of simple algorithms
context.additional_context: Performing team-based simulation tasks using smartphone-based collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners can design collaborative scenarios involving three or more agents using data-driven control principles
I/O learning algorithms that derive optimal consensus values by analyzing real measurement data can be applied
A control system demonstrating over 85% goal achievement can be constructed through team collaboration in limited information environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
